'identification stage of the model lifecycle y generating model performance metrics for'
'your entire dataset and your identified cohorts of data. It generates these metrics across'
'sugroups identified in terms of sensitive features or sensitive attriutes.'
'@ Note'
"Fairness is a socio-technical challenge. Quantitative fairness metrics don't capture"
'many aspects of fairness, such as justice and due process. Also, many quantitative'
"fairness metrics can't all e satisfied simultaneously."
'The goal of the Fairlearn open-source package is to enale humans to assess the'
"impact and mitigation strategies. Ultimately, it's up to the humans who uild Al and"
'machine learning models to make trade-offs that are appropriate for their'
'scenarios.'
